casebody.data:
CITY OF ATLANTIC CITY, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. FRANCES GINNETTI, DEFENDANT-APPELLANT. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Submitted May 24, 2000 Decided June 22, 2000.

Before Judges KING, CARCHMAN and LEPELT.

George K. Miller, Jr., attorney for appellant (Daniel J. Gallagher, on the brief). Skoloff & Wolfe, attorneys for respondent {Saul A. Wolfe, of counsel; Mr. Wolfe and Garry Roettger, on the brief). PER CURIAM.

We affirm the judgment of the Tax Court substantially for the reasons set forth in Judge Rimm’s thorough written opinion reported at 17 N.J.Tax 354 (Tax 1998).

Affirmed.
